# isPaused

**Instance Property**

Whether the clock should be paused, e.g. due to a stoppage in play.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isPaused: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If YES, the clock will be paused at the specified value.

If NO, the clock will count up (or down).
title: isPaused
